Message:
They share their food
even if they’re hungry,

and will help others
even if they’re hurt...

Even if they don’t
know who I really am,

There’s not an ounce
of bad in them.
I can’t stand it...!

I thought I had gotten
rid of this feeling for good...

At this rate, these guys are
going to cleanse me...

And so, surrounded by
a bunch of good people
and slowly losing my mind,

I made my way to
the Holy See.
